transcript.text: the truth is incontrovertible malice may

media is one of the most powerful

in America they have the power to shape
any narrative to sway mind to advance
any ideal and to even affect the outcome
of any election the media and the
journalists that comprise it are the
arbiters of truth of impartiality of
information for the people without
truthful verified information we
Americans are ill-equipped to make many
decisions about what's important to us
were unable to shape the world around us
or to correct any wrongs were unable to
hold our elected representatives
accountable the media is a vital and
crucial cornerstone of our republic and
unfortunately starting decades ago the
media began its spiral into corruption
they were overtaken by nefarious agendas
and greed and politics they were
weaponized as a propaganda arm of a
radical government gone rogue and year
after year it has only gotten worse not
better
we the people are actually wise to this
and social media has provided this
window that we wouldn't have normally
gotten inside of this seedy underbelly
of what was once looked at as a great
and honorable and respectable profession
we've seen private emails of operatives
and masquerading as journalists
attempting to shape perspective to

we've watched in horror as teenagers

all of this happens as violent
perpetrators are in attacking innocent

they've been held up on a pedestal
glorified in the eyes of a few but
reviled in the hearts of the many I
believe that this beautiful mask this

ugly picture that's underneath is
actually the best thing that could have
ever happened to this country the
American people aren't stupid
the American people are brilliant and as

we have turned now to one another to
demand something with value something
with integrity to replace it something
new something we can count on somewhere
we can read and learn and know that
we're getting the raw unvarnished
oftentimes even really painful truth
over the past several years I've been
working really hard to create a new

presence that I hope that people have
come to trust and rely on because like
we all deserve to have a place where we
can go and relax knowing that the

the facts a truly free press is one of

intentions it's one of the only ways
that we as a people can ensure a future
for our children that represents the

and the pursuit of happiness this
country is as important to me
as it is to all of you and with your

weaken our and every single breath to

excitement and responsibility to you

DC there's a gaping dark hole where

and contributes to bringing respect back

uncovered DC is going to be built on
